I had a disturbing thought the other day: what if… gender ideology becomes so ensconced into culture that WE become the ones who use their terminology? Words like “gay”, or “trans” become epithets? 

E.g. “Two men kissing isn’t ‘gay’ stop being a pervert!”

How insane is that?
